title: Secretary's Remarks: On the Occasion of the Day of German Unity (US Department of State) ...
text: ( Source : US Department of State ) On behalf of President Obama and the citizens of the United States , I congratulate the people of Germany on your celebration of the Day of German Unity on October 3. The unified Germany we see today inspires
